Spring 2021.Name: Alvie Stoddard
Spring 2021.Concentrations: Technology, Entrepreneurship, and Design, & Information Technology Management
Spring 2021.Projects: XHighlight - The fastest and easiest way to create your sports highlight videos. xhighlight.com
Spring 2021.About You: Alvie is an aspiring entrepreneur who is very interested in technology and programming. He is working on a startup, XHighlight, the fastest and easiest way to create sports and highlight videos. He is also CODE's most senior member, having lived in CODE since Sophomore year and being active in leadership decisions since the end of his freshman year.  Finally, he studied at Babson San Francisco in Spring 2018 and hopes to live out there upon graduation. Academics wise, he is a senior Graduating in May of 2021 and is concentrating in Technology, Entrepreneurship, and Design and Information Technology Management.

Spring 2021.Name: Krishna Madala
Spring 2021.Projects: Krishna is currently working on WhosVibing.com a platform where users can see the moods of their community at a glance.
Spring 2021.About You: Krishna is a professional esports coach and consultant who is currently building WhosVibing.com a social platform where users can see the moods of their community at a glance. Previously he built Startup Chest a resource for college founders as well as CoffeeBreak a platform which put influencers and fans together for paid 1 on 1 calls.

Spring 2021.Name: Gibson Munene
Spring 2021.Projects: Gibson is currently working  on a healthcare solution to be that allows faster delivery of medicine to customers from various pharmacies in kenya and canada (https://healthbank.tech/) .Gibson is also currently working on a software solution to help kids learn how to code(https://main.d1739eq1sf27t1.amplifyapp.com/)
Spring 2021.About You: Gibson is a software developer with a special interest business, entrepreneurship, networking and upcoming technologies like blockchain and machine learning. He has in the past been involved in the creation of peer to peer apps, blockchain solutions and decentralized applications.

Spring 2021.Name: Ashley Lim
Spring 2021.About You: Ashley recently became the president of Babson's Blockchain Club and is wanting to learn more about the technical components of blockchain, in addition to learning a new programming language (likely Python or C++). She is interested in starting a tech startup surrounding mental health and community and hopes to take courses at Olin and Wellesley College to help strengthen her coding skills and find business partners. As a CODE resident, Ashley is determined to make Babson students more technologically savvy and expose them to new technological innovations as inspiration for their own businesses or career. She also wants to bring more young women into CODE and help with outreach for CODE events.

Spring 2021.Name: Pratik Anand
Spring 2021.Projects: Pratik is currently working on developing Co-Host, a communications platform that prioritizes genuine connections. He is also continuing to work on his past ventures such as his clothing brand Fukapi LLC (www.fukapi.com). He is also the Director of Community Engagement at a political-science research organization.
Spring 2021.About You: Pratik is a current first-year student at Babson, graduating in May 2024. He's passionate about entrepreneurship, having started multiple startups in numerous industries. Some of his personal favorite ventures include a clothing brand (Fukapi LLC), a clay-based retail company (Clater), and a non-profit organization (COBALT). His long-term goal is to develop a scalable social media platform that facilitates authentic interactions. He is always open to discuss startups, talk about the next big technology, or literally anything. Feel free to reach out!

Spring 2021.Name: Anh Thu Le
Spring 2021.Projects: Anh Thu is working on her e-commerce businesses and development of Alexa skills
Spring 2021.About You: Energetic and social to be around with. Enjoy self learning new things that interest me (taught myself coding!). A very ambitious person that love talking about entrepreneurship in the tech field.

Spring 2021.Name: Angel
Spring 2021.Projects: Angel sells sneakers and trades stocks on the side while he devotes most of his time to his startup. He is currently building a community based and social impact streetwear/techwear brand.
Spring 2021.About You: I am an entrepreneur and investor, and I am very interested in tech startups. I am currently is the learning phase, but my goal is to have my own tech startup by the end of college.

Spring 2021.Name: Jane Wang
Spring 2021.Projects: Jane ran a French Macaron business during her years in high school. Currently, she is working on her FME venture called the Clean Command.
Spring 2021.About You: Jane Wang is a first year from San Diego, California. Besides being on Babson's tennis team, she has a passion for making and selling French Macarons. Jane has always been interested in the world of technology even though she is not very proficient in it, but she plans to learn more about it during her time at CODE. A fun fact about Jane is even though her dominant hand for tennis and sports is her right hand, she does everything else including using chopsticks with her left hand. GO BABO!!

Spring 2021.Name: Tommy Croissant
Spring 2021.Projects: Tommy is working on TECC - a venture focused on aiding in the global transition between gasoline and electric vehicles by providing conversion services at affordable prices.
Spring 2021.About You: Tommy is a budding entrepreneur from Chicago, passionate about innovation and the environment. He wants to have a heavy hand in creating a better tomorrow, and have a great time along the way. He is also an avid runner, audiophile, tinkerer, and adore the outdoors.

Spring 2021.Name: Amay Maheshwari
Spring 2021.About You: Amay is a sophomore that wants to work in the field of economics and data analytics in the future. He is working on becoming more proficient with analytics programs such as R-studio and Tableau and intends to become more familiar with python in the future. He is working on learning how to analyze data on Google Cloud Computing as well. He also enjoys playing soccer, cricket and reading books in his spare time.

Spring 2021.Name: Jason Sol (Lin)
Spring 2021.Projects: Onecase.app, a social app that turns your friend group into a creative incubator.
Spring 2021.About You: Jason is a sophomore who's interests reside in environmentalism, creative expression, and technology. He currently has aspirations in the field of product management and is working his way towards entrepreneurial endeavours. Also while not a fan of anthropocentrism, he really enjoys learning what drives people and is fascinated by what they can accomplish.

Spring 2021.Name: Jose Rodriguez Odon
Spring 2021.Projects: Jose is currently working on LGBT50, a social media influencer management company. They work with 100+ TikTok/Instagram influencers and have an aggregate social media presence of 75+ million.
Spring 2021.About You: Jose is part of the class of 2023, was born in Venezuela, and is passionate about the digital marketing space. He loves taking about innovative ideas and is always down to brainstorm ("Hit me up 🙌" - Jose). He founded LGBT50, an Influencer Management Company.

Spring 2021.Name: Sumer Sen
Spring 2021.Projects: Scout @ Open Scout. Open Scout is disrupting the social dynamics of venture capital, connecting founders and investors by their shared interests rather than their shared networks.
Spring 2021.About You: Sumer Sen is a sophomore at Babson College studying technology, entrepreneurship, and design. Sumer is currently a venture capital scout at Open Scout, a startup aimed at displacing the need for warm introductions within the early-stage financing process. Previously, he spent time in investment banking/public finance at Raymond James, sales & marketing at Fyrii.ai, and product growth at Run The World. Student founders: reach out for support with all aspects of your venture, including funding. Everyone else: reach out to chat anything product or venture!
